## Description {#details}

A convenience class that further groups segments based on memory deallocation policy.

This allows clients to make two slab allocations: one for all standard segments, and one for all finalize segments.

Definition at line 244 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlinkmemorymanager-h">JITLinkMemoryManager.h</a>.
